Song.title: To Be Like Jesus
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Pat Sczebel & Todd Twining © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship/Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | D | Em | C | G | D | C | C |]
Verse 1: [G]Love, joy, peace and [D]patience, too [Em]Grow in those who [C]trust in You [G]All who put their [D]hope in [C]Christ [| C] [G]Kindness, goodness, [D]faithfulness [Em]Self-control and [C]gentleness [G]Live in those who [D]have new [C]life [| C]
Chorus: [G] I want to [D]be like Jesus, [Em] [ ]to walk and [C]talk like Jesus [G] I want to [D]live like one who [Em]follows [C]Him [G] I want to [D]love like Jesus, [Em] [ ]to give my [C]all like Jesus [G] I want to [D]live like one who [Em]follows [C]Him
Verse 2: [G]I don’t always [D]do what’s right [Em]Jesus lived a [C]perfect life [G]And for sins like [D]mine, He [C]died. [| C] [G]Teach me to o[D]bey Your word [Em]Help me to put [C]others first [G]Holy Spirit, [D]change my [C]life [| C]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 love joy peace and patience too grow in those who trust in you all who put their hope in christ kindness goodness faithfulness selfcontrol and gentleness live in those who have new life chorus i want to be like jesus to walk and talk like jesus i want to live like one who follows him i want to love like jesus to give my all like jesus i want to live like one who follows him verse 2 i dont always do whats right jesus lived a perfect life and for sins like mine he died teach me to obey your word help me to put others first holy spirit change my life
